Incredible Toughness.name: Incredible Toughness
Incredible Toughness.flavor: Through dogged determination and sheer physical hardiness, you shrug off an effect that would daunt a lesser person.
keywords:
Personal

Trigger: You start your turn

Effect: You end any ongoing damage or any dazed, slowed, stunned, or weakened condition currently affecting you.
Incredible Toughness.effect: You end any ongoing damage or any dazed, slowed, stunned, or weakened condition currently affecting you.
